channel.title: Kalzumeus Software
channel.description: Patrick McKenzie (patio11) blogs on software development, marketing, and general business topics

item.title: Tether's Troubles in November 2022
item.dc:creator: Patrick McKenzie (patio11)
item.description: Tether's November 2022 attestation, even if believed, strongly suggests it blew up (again) during the recent crypto route.

item.title: Tether Required Recapitalization In May 2022
item.dc:creator: Patrick McKenzie (patio11)
item.description: Tether's March 2022 attestation, even if believed, shows that it became insolvent during the May 2022 crypto downturn.

item.title: App Store Payments Will Have Increased Competition
item.dc:creator: Patrick McKenzie (patio11)
item.description: Apple's App Store is reforming their guidelines about taking out-of-band payments. This will be very interesting for developers, especially in the games industry.

item.title: Solving The Vaccine Data Problem
item.dc:creator: Patrick McKenzie (patio11)
item.description: VaccinateCA, the non-profit I have been running, expanded nationally to Vaccinate The States. Here's what we've learned in the last 100 days.

item.title: What Working At Stripe Has Been Like
item.dc:creator: Patrick McKenzie (patio11)
item.description: I joined Stripe to work on building financial infrastructure for the Internet. Time flies. Here is what I've learned in the first four years.

item.title: An update on a pre-registered result about the coronavirus
item.dc:creator: Patrick McKenzie (patio11)
item.description: A history of an anomaly in the 2020 Coronavirus Pandemic, an independent research project about it, and what we need to learn about our next steps.

item.title: Dropping hashes: an idiom used to demonstrate provenance of documents
item.dc:creator: Patrick McKenzie (patio11)
item.description: There exists an idiom called “dropping a hash” which is widely understood in the security community and not widely understood elsewhere. Somewhat surprisingly, there does not appear to be a canonical explanation. I have dropped hashes before and wrote this up to explain the significance of it to non-specialists.

item.title: The Working Group's White paper on Japan and covid-19
item.dc:creator: Patrick McKenzie (patio11)
item.description: Author’s note: This is a copy of the white paper of the Working Group, a group of four pseudonymous professionals in Tokyo. I, Patrick McKenzie, was the primary author. It was distributed quietly during the week of March 25th, 2020. I have written an essay describing how this document came to be and demonstrating its provenance.

item.title: Tether: The Story So Far
item.dc:creator: Patrick McKenzie (patio11)
item.description: Tether is the internal accounting system for the largest fraud since Madoff. That is a robust claim, I know, but the evidence for it is overwhelming.

item.title: How Discount Brokerages Make Money
item.dc:creator: Patrick McKenzie (patio11)
item.description: Discount brokerages are accused of making their money via payment for order flow. This is wrong; it is actually mostly net interest revenue. That so dominates their business that selling trades for commissions is irrational; better to give away the trades to attract assets.
